body: The room scene is flashback. She got an offer for game beta test because the previous tester is not feeling well. The test last 2 hours, but perceived time in the server is 4 times faster, so it would feel like 8 hours play. She suspected the orcs might be players, as they know she's a "player" and used the slavery collar to force her to tell her real name. When she said she would get ejected out of the game when the time is up, rather than after being gangbanged by all the orcs, the elf girl she thought is NPC said she's also a player, and the secret server they're in now is set to 2400 times speed, so she will still be staying inside for another 200 days.
So if I get this right, she is just chilling in her room IRL looking at a game character of herself getting raped in her tablet?

@damonsykes

Please keep in mind, that the doujin above nearly never would have been completed, as the author suffered a serious heart attack and was hospitalized from 9/7 - 9/19. Tremendous respect for tsuina for creating such a fabulous doujin under such tough circumstances.
